option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.geometry.Insets?> <?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TextField?> <?import javafx.scene.image.Image?> <?import javafx.scene.image.ImageView?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.StackPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?> <?import javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Text?> <?import javafx.scene.text.TextFlow?>
<AnchorPane prefHeight="495.0" prefWidth="760.0" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example.typejam.TypingGameController"> <children> <StackPane prefHeight="496.0" prefWidth="761.0"> <children> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#2b5237" height="495.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" width="760.0" /> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="WHITE" height="400.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 50; -fx-arc-width: 50;" width="670.0" /> </children> </StackPane> <VBox alignment="TOP_CENTER" layoutX="46.0" layoutY="44.0" prefHeight="278.0" prefWidth="673.0"> <children> <Text fx:id="playerNameText" fill="#2b5237" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="{Name}" textAlignment="CENTER" wrappingWidth="379.6180624961853"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="32.0" /> </font> <VBox.margin> <Insets top="23.0" /> </VBox.margin> </Text> <Text fx:id="difficultyText" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="{Difficulty} Level"> <font> <Font name="Arial" size="16.0" /> </font> <VBox.margin> <Insets top="5.0" /> </VBox.margin> </Text> <StackPane alignment="TOP_CENTER" prefHeight="178.0" prefWidth="661.0"> <children> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="WHITE" height="180.0" stroke="#2b5237" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="5.0" style="-fx-arc-width: 40; -fx-arc-height: 40;" width="589.0"> <StackPane.margin> <Insets /> </StackPane.margin> </Rectangle> <TextFlow fx:id="dataTextFlow" maxWidth="551.0" prefWidth="551.0"> <StackPane.margin> <Insets left="20.0" right="20.0" top="15.0" /> </StackPane.margin> </TextFlow> </children> <VBox.margin> <Insets top="15.0" /> </VBox.margin> </StackPane> </children> </VBox> <StackPane layoutX="576.0" layoutY="49.0" prefHeight="94.0" prefWidth="102.0"> <children> <Rectangle arcHeight="5.0" arcWidth="5.0" fill="#2b5237" height="54.0" stroke="BLACK" strokeType="INSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" style="-fx-arc-height: 40; -fx-arc-width: 40;" width="99.0" /> <ImageView fitHeight="49.0" fitWidth="61.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="true"> <image> <Image url="@../../../images/infinity.png" /> </image> </ImageView> <Text fx:id="timeText" fill="#f6b539" strokeType="OUTSIDE" strokeWidth="0.0" text="0:00"> <font> <Font name="Arial Bold" size="21.0" /> </font> </Text> </children> </StackPane> <StackPane layoutX="87.0" layoutY="322.0" prefHeight="128.0" prefWidth="591.0"> <children> <TextField fx:id="typingField" prefHeight="55.0" prefWidth="591.0" promptText="Start typing here..." style="-fx-background-radius: 10; -fx-border-radius: 10; -fx-border-color: #2b5237; -fx-border-width: 2;"> <font> <Font size="19.0" /> </font> <padding> <Insets left="20.0" /> </padding> </TextField> </children> </StackPane> <HBox alignment="CENTER" layoutX="44.0" layoutY="50.0" prefHeight="70.0" prefWidth="94.0"> <children> <Button fx:id="backButton" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#onBack" prefHeight="52.0" style="-fx-background-color: white; -fx-background-radius: 100;"> <graphic> <ImageView fitHeight="52.0" fitWidth="52.0" pickOnBounds="true" preserveRatio="false"> <image> <Image url="@../../../assets/back.png" /> </image> </ImageView> </graphic> </Button> </children> </HBox> </children> </AnchorPane>
